question: What is the revised GDP growth projection of India for calendar year 2020 by Moody’s?
explanation:
The international rating agency, Moody’s Investors Service has recently revised India’s Gross Domestic Product (GDP) forecast to -8.9% contraction from -9.6% projected earlier, for calendar year 2020.
The agency has projected the GDP of India for 2021 as 8.6%, an upward revision from the earlier projection of 8.1%.
